Name: Google Spotlight Stories: Pearl

Set inside their home, a beloved hatchback, Pearl follows a girl and her dad as they crisscross the country chasing their dreams. Itâ€™s a story about the gifts we hand down and their power to carry love. And finding grace in the unlikeliest of places. Directed by Patrick Osborne
